message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.NE, cs.DM 

This paper is related to machine learning and classification, which falls under the category of cs.LG (Machine Learning). The use of SVMs and their extension for N-class classification also suggests the possibility of it being categorized under cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The mention of similarity and distance calculations for building a binary tree of SVM models indicates the involvement of computer vision, which falls under cs.CV (Computer Vision). The use of SVMs for classification also suggests the possibility of it being categorized under cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing). Finally, the mention of experimental results and scalability suggests the involvement of data mining, which falls under cs.DM (Data Mining).
